downloadTitle: Microsoft Azure Active Directory single sign-on for Confluence
downloadDescription: Use your Microsoft Azure Active Directory account with Atlassian Confluence server to enable single sign-on. This plugin uses SAML 2.0 for federation.
detailsSection:
Azure AD SSO plugin for Confluence supports Confluence Server versions 5.0 - 5.10 or 6.0.1 to 6.15.9, 7.0.1 to 7.20.1 and 7.20.3, 8.0.3 to 8.9.1 ,9.0.3, 9.1.0 version. Use your Microsoft Azure Active Directory account with Atlassian Confluence server to enable single sign-on. This way all your organization users can use the Azure AD credentials to login into the Confluence application. This plugin uses SAML 2.0 for federation.
Here is the article which provides step by step guide for configuring single sign-on https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/active-directory-saas-confluencemicrosoft-tutorial
Features added :
  • "Force Login" functionality allows the IT admins to force the Azure AD authentication to users. This way users will not see the username and password box and they will be forced to use SSO.
  • "Force Login" is configurable from the plugin.
  • You can pass the domain string to Azure AD so that Azure AD can directly redirect the user to your Federation server. This is only applicable if you are using the Federated domains with Azure AD.
  • Application Proxy Support - Checkbox on the configure plugin screen to toggle the App Proxy mode so as to make the Reply URL editable as per the need to point it to the proxy server URL.
  • Added support for confluence 8.0.3 to 9.1.0 version build.
systemRequirementsSection:
Supported Operating System
Windows Server 2016, Windows Server 2012 R2, Windows Server 2008 R2, Windows Server 2012.
Confluence Server 5.0 - 5.10 or 6.0.1 to 6.15.9, 7.0.1 to 7.20.1 and 7.20.3, 8.0.3 to 8.9.1 , 9.0.3 ,9.1.0 should be installed and configured on Windows 64-bit version
installInstructionSection:
Following are the installation requirements for this plugin.
  • Confluence should be installed on a Windows 64-bit version.
  • Confluence version should be HTTPS enabled.
  • Note the supported version for Plugin in “Supported Versions” section below.
  • Confluence server should be reachable on internet.
  • Admin credentials for Confluence server.
  • Global admin credentials for Azure AD.
  • WebSudo should be disabled in Confluence.
Supported Versions:
  • Confluence Server 5.0 to 5.10.
  • Confluence Server 6.0.1 to 6.15.9, 7.0.1 to 7.20.1 and 7.20.3 to 8.9.1, 9.0.3, 9.1.0
Detailed intructions to confligure the plugin are mentioned in this document. https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/active-directory/active-directory-saas-confluencemicrosoft-tutorial
additionalInformationSection: This is Microsoft proprietory add-on for Atlassian Conflucence Server 5.0 - 5.10 or 6.0.1 to 6.15.9, 7.0.1 to 7.17 and 7.20.3 to 8.9.1, 9.0.3,9.1.0.

relatedResourcesSection.title: azure AD and Confluence SSO Integration Tutorial
